Uses of Class
org.gridgain.client.GridClientException

Packages that use GridClientException
org.gridgain.client Public API for GridGain Java client. 
 

Uses of GridClientException in org.gridgain.client
 

Subclasses of GridClientException in org.gridgain.client
 class GridClientAuthenticationException
          Exception that represents client authentication failure for some reason.
 class GridClientClosedException
          This exception is thrown whenever a closed client is attempted to be used.
 class GridServerUnreachableException
          This exception is thrown when none of the servers specified in client configuration can be connected to within timeout.
